languages.text: "А ксеносы каждый раз меняют свои хваленые пути, когда сталкиваются с трудностями? Поэтому вы и падете перед упорством Человечества".
languages.translation_comment:
At the shipwreck with the recolligers / space scavengers.
Yrliet: "Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"

traits.locale_text: "А ксеносы каждый раз меняют свои хваленые пути, когда сталкиваются с трудностями? Поэтому вы и падете перед упорством Человечества".

languages.text: "Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."
languages.translation_comment:
At the shipwreck with the recolligers / space scavengers.
Yrliet: "Do these mon-keigh truly spend their brief lives digging through refuse? Why do they not choose another Path? Find another self?"
languages.original_text: "А ксеносы каждый раз меняют свои хваленые пути, когда сталкиваются с трудностями? Поэтому вы и падете перед упорством Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."
"Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."
"Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."
"Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."
"Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."
"Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."

languages.text: 「異種族どもは、状況が厳しくなるといつも誇り高き『道』とやらをあっさり捨てるのか？だからこそお前たちは、人類の不屈の意志の前にすべて崩れ去るんだ」
languages.original_text: "Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族どもは、状況が厳しくなるといつも誇り高き『道』とやらをあっさり捨てるのか？だからこそお前たちは、人類の不屈の意志の前にすべて崩れ去るんだ」

languages.text: "Verlassen Xenos immer ihre ach so heiligen Pfade, sobald die ersten Schwierigkeiten auftreten? Darum werdet Ihr alle im Angesicht der Entschlossenheit der Menschheit zerbröckeln."
languages.original_text: "Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."

traits.locale_text: "Verlassen Xenos immer ihre ach so heiligen Pfade, sobald die ersten Schwierigkeiten auftreten? Darum werdet Ihr alle im Angesicht der Entschlossenheit der Menschheit zerbröckeln."

languages.text: « Les xénos abandonnent-ils leurs fameuses Voies au moindre obstacle ? Voilà pourquoi vous tomberez tous face à la détermination de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."

traits.locale_text: « Les xénos abandonnent-ils leurs fameuses Voies au moindre obstacle ? Voilà pourquoi vous tomberez tous face à la détermination de l'humanité. »

languages.text: «¿Los xenos abandonan sus cacareadas sendas en cuanto las cosas se les complican? Por eso se derrumbarán todos ante la férrea determinación de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."

traits.locale_text: «¿Los xenos abandonan sus cacareadas sendas en cuanto las cosas se les complican? Por eso se derrumbarán todos ante la férrea determinación de la Humanidad».

languages.text: “异形是不是一遇到困难，就立刻放弃他们自诩的什么‘道途’？难怪你们在人类的决心面前溃不成军。”
languages.original_text: "Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."

traits.locale_text: “异形是不是一遇到困难，就立刻放弃他们自诩的什么‘道途’？难怪你们在人类的决心面前溃不成军。”

languages.text: "Peki zenolar neden en ufak zorlukta o çok sevdikleri Yollarından sapıyor? İşte bu yüzden İnsanlığın azmi karşısında yenileceksiniz."
languages.original_text: "Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."

traits.locale_text: "Peki zenolar neden en ufak zorlukta o çok sevdikleri Yollarından çıkıyorlar? İşte bu yüzden İnsanlık'ın azmi karşısında yenileceksiniz."

languages.original_text: "Do xenos always abandon their vaunted Paths whenever the going gets tough? That is why you will all crumble before Humanity's resolve."
